faq.question: Can you film at our business location in Loughrea?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We regularly film on-site at business locations throughout Loughrea and South Galway. We bring all necessary equipment and work professionally to minimize disruption while capturing excellent footage of your operations, team, and facilities.

faq.question: What types of videos do you produce?
faq.answer: We create all types of business videos including promotional videos, social media content, customer testimonials, product demonstrations, corporate communications, training videos, event coverage, and commercial advertisements. We'll recommend the best approach for your goals.

faq.question: How long does video production take?
faq.answer: Timeline varies by project. Simple videos can be completed in 1-2 weeks, while comprehensive productions typically take 3-6 weeks from concept to final delivery. We provide detailed schedules and maintain clear communication throughout the process.

faq.question: Do you offer scriptwriting services?
faq.answer: Yes! Professional scriptwriting is included in our video production service. Our writers can work from your ideas or develop concepts from scratch, ensuring the script effectively communicates your message and resonates with your audience.

faq.question: What's the investment for video production?
faq.answer: Costs vary based on requirements. Social media videos start from €1,500, business videos from €3,500-€6,000, and comprehensive productions from €8,000+. We provide transparent quotes tailored to your project scope and budget.

faq.question: Can you optimize videos for social media?
faq.answer: Yes! We create and optimize videos specifically for each social platform – Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, and YouTube. Each version is formatted with the right aspect ratio, length, and style to maximize engagement on that platform.

faq.question: Do you provide video marketing services?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We're a full-service digital agency offering complete video marketing including distribution strategy, YouTube SEO, social media advertising, email campaigns, and analytics to ensure your videos generate measurable business results.

faq.question: Will we own the rights to our videos?
faq.answer: Yes! You receive complete ownership and unlimited usage rights for all videos we produce. We deliver files in all necessary formats for unrestricted use across any channels, platforms, or purposes you choose.
